website_summaries.verdict: The best back shaver out there, but pales in comparison to competitors for use on other parts of the body.
pros: If you need a good back shaver, look no further -- this is the best one on the market
cons: Very specialized -- if you don't need a back shaver, you can find other groomers that do a lot more than this one will

customer_reviews.title: Just plain sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Was very hopeful when i bought it but after giving it multiple tries i have now given up on using this. The trimmer blades do a very bad job of providing a uniform trim. You need multiple passes on the same area to completely remove all the hair. The ergonomic handle is long but not really ergonomic. I'm not the most flexible but the design definitely makes it hard to reach most areas on the back. Maybe if it was $20, but not worth $35+.
customer_reviews.author: Suraj T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for bodybuilders
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this machine I’m s competitive bodybuilder and I bought this to shave my legs and lower back, the handle makes it super easy and it doesn’t make me get rashes like razors do, love this thing,
customer_reviews.author: Aesthetic Jones

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This was my second one and this one stopped working after a couple months. Pure Garbage. Don't waste your $$$.
customer_reviews.author: MintBearyKrunch

customer_reviews.title: One of the best body hair trimmers out there till date
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have used many body hair trimmers. Some were a plain waste of money while the others didn't work as efficiently as they did the first time. This one though is different from the ones I have purchased in the past. Because it has a trimmer coil head and not the regular shaver with a blade, it works efficiently every time, without having to worry about the blades going blunt. Second, the tool is light in weight, has a flexible design and therefore, allows the user to use it easily without depending on other family members to help them out. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sagar Lokhande

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: I had an earlier version of the Mangroomer which was much smaller and without an extension handle to reach areas of my back. I had tapped a piece of wood to it to act as an extension handle. After a few years of use I discovered this newer upgraded Mangroomer and decided to go for it. What a HUGE improvement this is. It reaches all areas of my back perfectly and seems solidly built. It shaved my back perfectly and left it nice and smooth with the 2 attachment head. Buy this you and won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Ynot

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy in NYC
customer_reviews.text: I've been "growing" back hair in recent years. Since then, my primary barber has helped to keep things under control in the back room of his shop. Unfortunately, he doesn't pack well when traveling for extended periods of time. I came across the 'Mangroomer' on Amazon and ordered one to see how well it worked. It came today and I was so excited that I charged it and took it for a dry run. Well, it did an excellent job and in the privacy of my own home. I'm happy, my wife is happy and my barber will be very happy he won't have to sweep out the back room any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Rob-NYC

customer_reviews.title: Way better than Bakblade!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it today, got it today. Tried it immediately... LOVE IT!!! I tried both heads that came with it, no pulling, no scratching, very close and finished entire back area in less than 10 minutes, and I'm not limber or thin. And best of all, absolutely no uncomfortable feeling when I put my shirt on. I'd recommend this to anyone looking to have a clean, close shave. I was having my back waxed, and that hurt like a MF. I'll never have to go back to that as long as this product is made!
customer_reviews.author: CHITOWNMAN

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this groomer
customer_reviews.text: It works well for me. The groomer cuts bodily hair fairly close especially with the other attachment. Hopefully it will continue to do so for a while. I would recommend this groomer.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Carter

customer_reviews.title: Very well built!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I hardly write reviews on products unless I really like something or I trully hate something and this product is awesome. It is well built and very easy to use. I trully love the rugged feel to it. Ive owned it for a couple months now since my lovely wife wouldnt help me take care of my back hair. AMAZING PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: daniel longoria

customer_reviews.title: Such a great idea and it doesn't leave razor burn like a ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! Gone are the days that I have to stand behind him and shave his back for him! He can do it himself and he has no problems with that. Such a great idea and it doesn't leave razor burn like a regular razor.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product!! I upgraded to my original Mangroomer Back Shaver with this one and glad I did. This one is better built with more power. I will continue to purchase this back shaver for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: HoustonAstrosFan1970

customer_reviews.title: Painful scratches on my back every time
customer_reviews.text: Although it seems like this should work, I have used it twice and both times there were large scratches on my back. Kind of like what would happen if a cat scratched me very deeply. I looked at the shaver head and it's rusted, and I've only used it twice. Unfortunately I'm already past my return window, but I would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shaver, handle works great for hard to reach back!
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with many other devices. If you don't have someone around to help or convince to help this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W

customer_reviews.title: This thing did a great job. This thing worked on the front too ...
customer_reviews.text: Ladies and Gentlemen, Let me start by saying I am The Yeti, The Sasquatch, The Wool Sweater under the stairs, The Man Beast, The Feral man with Wooly Mammoth era type fur. I did my whole back in about 20 minutes. This thing did a great job. This thing worked on the front too with a little more work but on the back and front this thing rocks. I didn't have to recharge it either.Wish I had taken before and after pictures but the photos may not be suitable for those who have a fear that the Sasquatch really exists, or young children.
customer_reviews.author: CHECKUR6

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The two head styles really allow for a clean shave. I had the old version and this is clearly superior. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I am not super hairy, but at +50 years old, the fun of "hey --- where'd that hair come from" is well underway ... Charge this dude up, go outside (in the garage) and let-her-rip. The handle extension makes it possible to get everywhere. I have a few moles to watch, so far not nicks/bleeding like with a razor blade. Good device!
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: A hairy dudes savior!
customer_reviews.text: So I’m pretty sure if I did a DNA test I’d find I’m part Sasquatch. That said I’ve always had to rely on someone else to shave what years of whiskey drinking has done to my back (it doesn’t just put hair on your chest kids). This thing does the trick and quickly. I can look like Michael Phelps in about 5 minutes thanks to this great tool!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nye

customer_reviews.title: Guys - this is it.  Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: This really works flawlessly. When I had my wife check my work she didn't need to do any touch ups. The arm-bend and reach are very well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer of Things

customer_reviews.title: Better than straight razor!!
customer_reviews.text: Being of Italian heritage, I tried this and was truly impressed!!! Took using both heads to give smooth results and one charge did my back and front. No razor burn or nicks to be had. Highly recommend this unit!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Scanzera

customer_reviews.title: Transforms the back in to a smooth to rain.
customer_reviews.text: This product works! Because I am not normally shaving my back, it takes a little while to develop the coordination to use it. But once I get the hang of it, I am able to shave the hair from my back and maintain a smooth skin surface. I love this thing. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: T. Estler

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: So I'm 30 and always struggled with this disgusting mass of back hair. I'd gotten girlfriends to shave it before or tried horrible to do it myself with a regular razor. I was seriously going to save up for electrolysis (thousands) or get it waxed (at least the cost of this each time) next time I was doing anything swimming related. But then I bought this and within minutes I got everything off. This is so easy I wouldn't mind doing it frequently. If you're thinking about buying it, just do it. Be lucky that you thought of looking up "back shaver" rather than continuing to suffer in silence.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Crothers

customer_reviews.title: Great male Groomer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a male grooming shaver for awhile and hands down this solved all my problems. The extended reach is great and I get a close shave that last for weeks
customer_reviews.author: Mariko Shakespeare

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Been using for about a year and this thing is built well.
customer_reviews.author: B Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Get this Guys!
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is great. No more waiting for someone to shave my back for me. Cuts really close and very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Knopf

customer_reviews.title: Holy moly, it works
customer_reviews.text: This is a revelation. I've been Robin-Williams-type hairy for most of my life and reaching back there was such a pain I usually didn't bother trimming. Now that I've found this device it's no big deal. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: KevinM

customer_reviews.title: Works Better than Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I see one of these gadgets I always wonder if they really work. Couldn't talk my significant other into clipping my back any more and so made the purchase. Much to my surprise they work great! Took a little bit to get used to working this, using the bathroom mirror in front and a tall mirror in back, but after a few minutes got the hang of it. I've used these now 3 or 4 times and they do a great job. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MattEnge

customer_reviews.title: Works great - no longer have to sprain my wrists to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great - no longer have to sprain my wrists to reach my back! Using it less and less as hair stops growing back as fast.
customer_reviews.author: the artist formerly known as Movie, freak

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got rid of my unsightly, unwanted back hair without being embarrassed by asking my girfriend or a professional to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Erich

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing out there quite like it. Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have purchased. There is nothing out there quite like it. Gets the job done, battery life is long and it is just a good product.!
customer_reviews.author: Keeley Wolf

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY GREAT BACK GROOMER
customer_reviews.text: This groomer is made really well. Does the job perfectly. I would highly recommend this groomer to anyone with hair on their back. You can reach everywhere with this thing. Does a good job getting your back nice and clean. Highly recommended. Although, the packaging was real tough to get into initially. Blister packs are horrible. Gotta use scissors or a knife to get inside the packaging. Kind of dangerous if you are clumsy. But otherwise, a great product. Hope it works for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: This thing makes it easy to keep yourself groomed with minimal effort
customer_reviews.text: This thing is something I'd never thought of needing, but now that I have it I wouldn't live without it. While I am quite hairy in general, everyone gets some amount of weird hairs on upper back, lower back, shoulders, arms, really wherever. This thing makes it easy to keep yourself groomed with minimal effort!
customer_reviews.author: Quite_Odd

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL.
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Doesnt leave scratches or cuts. Works well. Takes a while to get the hard to reach spots and is a little rigid but works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Works unbelievably well
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much of this to tell the truth. But after using this groomer a couple of times, I am sold on it. Shaves smooth and fast.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: OMG greatest invention ever
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought this a long time ago. Just got it about 10 minutes ago and now my back is smooth as a baby's butt.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I had the old version and upgrade to this one when mine finally stopped working. It is awesome. makes it very easy to git rid of unwanted back hair. super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Localbuzz

customer_reviews.title: WoopWoop!!
customer_reviews.text: To be totally honest it has one shortfall.... in some more sensitive areas the blades may make discomfort, but who the hell cares if it works!! That outa the way.... this thing rocks!! I wouldn’t change anything about it, 🤔 unless maybe it was self propelled like a Rumba. I use it to trim my entire entirety except my head. It works very well and battery has never run out on me, even after sitting in a drawer for several months. If you want to cut back body hair, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mauigold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shocked that this product is so awesome! Well made! Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome works great easy to use powerful worth every penny would definitely buy again will be a forever product for me a must have

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: So glad I sprang for this. Excellent product. Very easy to use with variable angles -- even if you suffer from shoulder problems and limited flexibility. Used to shave in the shower, but those days are over.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee InfusionTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better then the previous model. Perfect money saver and great quality

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: works great. been using it for over a year now.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to use and ergonomic, more efficient than expected.
customer_reviews.author: R. Klapperich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I used to have my wife shave my back for me and now I can just do it myself. Great quality and would recommend for us Yeti like folks.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Munson

customer_reviews.title: Good, Sturdy, Tool
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind being super hairy until the body hair is 2" long and I look like bigfoot. I hate asking my wife to do the grooming, so this tool caught my interest. I have only used it one time, but I can do the manscaping by myself. I will update this review if things change, but this is a sturdy tool and I'm a tool-guy. It's not real loud and I also bought the case which I like so I can put it out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: B. Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it cuts hair without cutting skin. Not sure what else you'd want
customer_reviews.author: R. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I don't have that much hair growth, but it cleans everything up nicely. It has an attachment for a closer shave, and the battery lasts a while. I was thinking about laser hair removal but I feel I don't need it anymore. Great Product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great and was able to reach all areas of my back.
customer_reviews.author: baf

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, wish I would have bought sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical seeing the negative reviews. I decided for the price to give it a try. I have to say it works great. I have charged and used it 3 times now without issues. To those that complain about getting cut or nicked by it, I can only figure they are putting too much pressure or are in a hurry. I am patient and have to lightly go over an area a couple times to work effective, but I have no complaints. If/when this one dies, I will likely purchase another one as long as I get at least 6 months out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: tony konetzke

customer_reviews.title: Man groomer, recomended👍
customer_reviews.text: The groomer very easy to handle, works great , easy reach!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not great
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product for the price, but the long hair trimmer is sharp and it put several scratches on me. The close hair shaver/trimmer snags longer hairs that may not have been cut with the first blade. Overall not a bad product, but it is a bit clumsy especially when shaving the chest area due to the length of the shaving arm and extension.
customer_reviews.author: skyman

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've looked for a product like this for a long time. It works GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Jewell

customer_reviews.title: I looked a long time to find the best product for removing back hair and I've finally found ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked a long time to find the best product for removing back hair and I've finally found it in this excellent device. It's well made, works as advertised and I highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and the interchangeable blades make it better
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Been using it for years now. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Marigold

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. I grow body hair like crazy (must have gorilla genes). This shaver did very well in shaving all the body hair. The only thing I wish they had was adjustable shaving length. The wireless battery lasts pretty good. I've used it once and will update my review again if something goes wrong with it. It does take a bit of getting used to handling when shaving my back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what I expected works great and is very versatile. I highly recommend it

customer_reviews.title: Best solution for back hair!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, and very low impact, you almost never nick yourself when using it, and you can get a very close shave, I would suggest using an aftershave gel after but amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: KyleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I invented this years ago by taping a hair trimmer to a back scratcher. Should have moved forward with that. Anyway, I love this product.

customer_reviews.title: Back shaver
customer_reviews.text: Works great nice travel case rechargeable with charger. Durable and does not leave marks

customer_reviews.title: I have destroyed many a hotel room with this product ...
customer_reviews.text: I have destroyed many a hotel room with this product. Shreds my back beard and is also very gentle in the most intimate areas. And by intimate areas I mean my taint.
customer_reviews.author: BitterInBflo

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: great product for those hard to reach areas you need to trim / shave .. i love it
customer_reviews.author: salvador

customer_reviews.title: I love this product !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. One of my most useful and favorite purchases with Amazon Prime (and I purchase a lot). It is so much better than asking\pleading your wife or girlfriend to trim it with a razor. They do not like that duty. I thatch my back once every 10 days over the past 6 months with this device otherwise I am the missing link to modern man. A true Sasquatch. I think the charge lasts about 5 thatchings - and I use the power burst turbo-Sasquatch setting . Unless you keep up with the growth everyday, use the trimmer head first before the foil head, otherwise it can sting a little. I love this product !
customer_reviews.author: John LeClair

customer_reviews.title: AWESOMENESS!!!=
customer_reviews.text: This shavers rocks. I tried it a few hours after it arrived. Only took me 7-8 minutes for my first time to shave my back, and it did a perfect job.
customer_reviews.author: TLP

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot sing this product's praises anymore. After a decade or more of using normal clippers to shave my back (which is nearly impossible, especially when you're retaining fat), I found these and they changed my life. The hair just falls off easily. Serves as a good back scratcher too, as an added unintended bonus. I had surgery a few days after getting this. Immobilized by the surgery, I had a difficult time scratching parts of my body...this machine made it easy to scratch hard to reach parts. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Allgrim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Groomer
customer_reviews.text: One of the best inventions for man or woman. I have purchased 2 just in case. I tan frequently and need hair removed from my body. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Randall E. Starman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT DOES WHAT IS SAYS IT DOES RELIEF FROM BACK HAIR

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised that I like this as much as I do
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised that I like this as much as I do. As others have mentioned, the biggest tip is to use a mirror. You'll have to figure out adjusting the angle and length so that the head is flush against your skin. A mirror helps you see what's going on so you can adjust as you go, you'll need different settings for side-back, middle back, lower-back, etc. I haven't had any issues with scratching, cuts or irritation even when I don't have the angle right. If you're cutting your back you are pressing way, way too hard. The only negative thing I would say is that this is loud. Much louder than an electric razor or even clippers.
customer_reviews.author: hcp22

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: i have used this few times for the past couple of months and no issues so far
customer_reviews.author: Traveller

customer_reviews.title: This chargeable one is great.
customer_reviews.text: I had a much earlier version of this which used batteries. That one was okay but went through batteries fairly quickly. This chargeable one is great.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent

Like other reviewers said, use the larger trimmer first before going so close with the shaver. If you aren't used to to, you will likely get some pimples with the close one.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect perfect perfect, only issue is and not related to device is it's hard to see your back and make sure you got it all. Other than that is works splendidly

customer_reviews.text: This is the best man-scaper I have ever found. Renders the hard to reach spots on my back hairless!!!

customer_reviews.text: This works awesome! I had the older version that lasted 12 years. This one is much, much better!

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well!!! A minor point, the charge light always stay red as long as its charged. I would expect it will change to green when the battery is full. Nevertheless this does not interfere with its function. Shaving the back is easier than ever. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for easy hair removal.
customer_reviews.text: Got this back in Sept 2016. I use it every 2 to 3 days for hair removal on my back and arms, to show my gains. So far I have been very satisfied with this product, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lobo22

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, well executed.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, multi position handle and extension with locks makes reaching your entire back easy. You have to use it with a mirror until you get used to it. The 2 head system is awesome and the foil shaver works better than average for a foil type (they are usually terrible). Battery takes a long time to charge. The power boost is a nice feature. Changing positions isn't very smooth, hard plastic click noise, maybe it will loosen up with more use. Great concept, well executed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is freaking amazing! it's so much easier than what I used to try to do. I've used it about a dozen times now and it's working perfectly. The open and close feature is pretty tough so I've never needed to lock it in position.
customer_reviews.author: Trillian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my gorilla back lol Last several shaves before charges Great product
customer_reviews.author: Tony Montana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely matter and my husband loves it
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Breaks too easily.
customer_reviews.text: This the second one I bought that’s broken down. At first worked great, but isn’t built to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wanderman

customer_reviews.title: A Yes for us Hairy Back Guys.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Shaver. I can reach anywhere, and the battery stays charged for a long, long time. I would definitely recommend this shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Kungfu

customer_reviews.title: First product I have found that works as described! ...
customer_reviews.text: First product I have found that works as described! It is outstanding and reaches all the hard to get places.
customer_reviews.author: cjo34

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Easy to use, both heads work very well and gets the job done quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Panda3

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I bought it because of the reviews, but was skeptical it could deal with my jungle. It works perfectly well. Takes 5-10 minutes to do my whole back, holds a long charge, and doesn't do any damage to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Vaughan

product_meta.title: MANGROOMER Ultimate Pro Back Shaver with 2 Shock Absorber Flex Heads, Power Hinge, Extreme Reach Handle and Power Burst
product_meta.description:
Introducing the MANGROOMER - ULTIMATE PRO Do-It-Yourself Electric Back Hair Shaver, our best-selling and most advanced back shaver, built after more than ten years of research and development.

The MANGROOMER - ULTIMATE PRO Back Shaver comes with 2 Cutting-Edge Attachment Shaving Heads, each with Shock Absorber Flex Necks. It features a 1.8 inch Ultra Wide Back Groomer Blade to shave large areas and longer hairs quickly, plus an additional Foil Body Groomer Bi-Directional Head for regular maintenance, shorter hairs, and a perfectly smooth shave. 

The Shock Absorber Multi-Functional Flex Neck on both of the Attachment Heads effortlessly follows the contours of your back for perfect blade-to-skin contact at any angle, resulting in the ULTIMATE shave in both comfort and closeness. Our Ultra-Sensitive Blades are Hypoallergenic and made from Stainless Steel, giving you a soothing, non-irritating shave. 

The new Hexagon Handle Design has an Ergonomic Rubberized Grip allowing for maximum control, stability and comfort during operation. 

In addition, we have designed and added the new Power Hinge Easy Push Lock Button, allowing you to lock your ULTIMATE PRO Back Shaver at the angle of your choice and from any shaving position you desire. 

A new advanced Quick Charge Battery allows for easy and fast re-charging, plus a Charge Indicator Light alerts you when the back shaver is charging (red) and fully charged (green). For optimum battery life, please note the initial charge could take up to 48 hours before achieving full green light status. 

Look great and MAINTAIN YOURSELF to be back hair free with the new MANGROOMER - ULTIMATE PRO Back Hair Shaver!
feature_bullets: The new ULTIMATE PRO Back Shaver's unique patented design will enable you to reach all areas of your back by yourself with ease and shave off all your back hair effortlessly, plus added Power Burst button to shave through extra thick and coarse hair. battery life is estimated 3-4 years.Charging time from depleted to full charge is 6-8 hours, but initial charge can be from 8-12 hours

2 Interchangeable Attachment Shaving Heads - 1.8 inch ultra wide back groomer blade to shave large areas and longer hairs quickly, plus an additional foil body groomer bi-directional head for regular maintenance, shorter hairs and a perfectly smooth shave

Shock Absorber Multi-Functional Flex Necks on both Attachment Heads effortlessly follows the contours of your back for perfect blade to skin contact at any angle, resulting in the ultimate shave in both comfort and closeness

Extreme Reach Extendable Ergonomic Rubberized Handle locks into place at any length you choose with the new PRO XL Extension Lock Button, plus the new Power Hinge Easy Push Lock Button allows you to lock your ULTIMATE PRO Back Shaver at any angle you want
Please note your shaver will not work while plugged into the power source, so please unplug and then turn ON to operate.

A new advanced quick charge battery allows for easy and fast re-charging, plus a Charge Light Indicator alerts you when the back shaver is charging (red) and fully charged (green). Care and Cleaning: Rinse with Water, Wipe Clean.Special plastic handle offers people with improved griping feature

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
